content: 49 l k5 l k34 42 l k5 tw d k20 round 50 d k5 d k34 42 d k5 tw l k20 turn sl 19 round 51 d p6 d p34 42 d p6 tw l p18 round 52 l p6 l p34 42 l p7 tw d p17 turn sl 17 having completed the ship intarsia pattern work 1 round as follows l k7 l k34 42 sl 6 turn d p6 now both yarns are at the beginning of the round turn the work so the knit side is facing you remove marker change to larger needles and continue by working waves to make things easier rearrange the sts so that the next 32 32 sts are on 1 needle and the other 32 40 sts are on the other needle s waves round 1 with d tw k around round 2 with d * k1 m1 p2tog p2tog p2tog m1 k1 m1 repeat from * around round 3 with d k around round 4 with l tw k around round 5 with l * k1 m1 p2tog p2tog p2tog m1 k1 m1 repeat from * around round 6 with l k around repeat these 6 rounds 2 more times i e 18 rounds all together ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved flying dutchman v 1 2 page 3/6 flying dutchman socks - by caoua coffee ship chart for visual aid only follow the written directions for actual knitting ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved flying dutchman v 1 2 page 4/6 flying dutchman socks - by caoua coffee set-up for heel flap change to smaller needles right sock only with l k12 12 turn sl 12 12 turn with d k 12 12 left sock only with l k50 54 sl 14 18 with d k 50 54 continue for both socks put next 32 36 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep the heel is worked back and forth in d over the 32 36 sts you have still on the needles don t break l just let it hang where it is and turn your work heel flap ws sl yf p31 35 turn rs sl yb k1 16 18 times turn work theses 2 row 16 17 times i e 32 34 row total turn heel ws sl yf p18 20 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k7 7 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat theses last 2 row until all sts have been worked now 20 22 heel sts remain gusset setup still continuing to work with d only pick up and knit 17 18 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting all the 32 36 held instep
